name: SuperCold (Bacon Warrior)
description:
Move - WASD (If you dont move, you die after a short period of time)

Right click - Red bat hit

Left click - Blue bat hit

Q - throw blue bat

R - throw red bat

The enemies and bullets can only be hit and reflect with his respective color

The dor to the next level opens when you defeat all enemies in the scene, after 4  rooms your are going to face a final boss controlled by a brutal AI.

This game was made for a proyect school, hope you enjoy.
